statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_id, response_to_tactic FROM customer_segments;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_segments WHERE response_to_tactic = TRUE;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_segments WHERE response_to_tactic = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, response_to_tactic FROM customer_segments WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_segments WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 OR response_to_tactic = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM customer_segments WHERE response_to_tactic = FALSE ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE response_to_tactics = false;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, response_to_tactics FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE response_to_tactics = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, response_to_tactics FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT tactic_name, tactic_description FROM tactics WHERE tactic_id < 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN tactics ON customers.customer_id = tactics.tactic_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE response_to_tactic = 1;
SELECT name, tactic_name FROM customers JOIN customer_response ON customers.customer_id = customer_response.customer_id JOIN tactics ON customer_response.tactic_id = tactics.tactic_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_response WHERE response_score > 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;

SELECT customer_id, tactic_name, response_score FROM customers JOIN customer_response ON customers.customer_id = customer_response.customer_id JOIN tactics ON customer_response.tactic_id = tactics.tactic_id WHERE response_score BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY response_score DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE response_to_tactic = 3 ORDER BY customer_id LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.name, t.tactic_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN customer_response cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id INNER JOIN tactics t ON cr.tactic_id = t.tactic_id WHERE cr.response_score > 50 ORDER BY c.name, t.tactic_name DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, t.tactic_name AS tactic_name, cr.response_score FROM customers c, tactics t, customer_response cr WHERE c.customer_id = cr.customer_id AND t.tactic_id = cr.tactic_id AND cr.response_score BETWEEN 20 AND 80 ORDER BY cr.response_score DESC, c.name ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT c.name, cr.response_score FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_response cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.response_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cr.response_score DESC, c.name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM customer_segments JOIN segments ON customer_segments.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT tactic_name, cost FROM tactics WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE response_to_guerrilla_tactics = TRUE;
SELECT c.name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT c.name, t.tactic_name, t.cost FROM customers c JOIN tactics t ON c.customer_id = t.tactic_id WHERE t.cost > 100;

SELECT c.name, s.segment_name, t.tactic_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id LEFT JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id LEFT JOIN tactics t ON c.customer_id = t.tactic_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT tactic_name, tactic_description FROM MarketingTactics;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, guerrilla_marketing_response FROM Customers WHERE guerrilla_marketing_response = TRUE;
SELECT segment_name FROM CustomerSegmentation ORDER BY segment_name DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, MarketingTactics.tactic_name FROM Customers JOIN CustomerTactics ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerTactics.customer_id JOIN MarketingTactics ON CustomerTactics.tactic_id = MarketingTactics.tactic_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, guerrilla_marketing_response FROM Customers WHERE guerrilla_marketing_response = TRUE;

SELECT customer_name, tactic_name, tactic_description FROM Customers JOIN CustomerTactics ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerTactics.customer_id JOIN MarketingTactics ON CustomerTactics.tactic_id = MarketingTactics.tactic_id;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM CustomerSegments JOIN CustomerSegmentation ON CustomerSegments.segmentation_id = CustomerSegmentation.segmentation_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, CustomerSegmentation.segment_name FROM Customers JOIN CustomerSegments ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerSegments.customer_id JOIN CustomerSegmentation ON CustomerSegments.segmentation_id = CustomerSegmentation.segmentation_id;
